caption: Table 1: Previous works showed that large batch sizes achieve high performing models [DBHSB22]. Using our heuristic analysis it is possible to achieve similar performance for smaller batch sizes.
description: This table compares the performance of training WideResNet models on CIFAR-10 using different batch sizes.  It shows that using a heuristic privacy analysis, similar accuracy can be achieved with smaller batch sizes (512 and 256) compared to much larger batch sizes (4096) while maintaining comparable empirical privacy loss.  The table also lists the heuristic and standard epsilon values and the accuracy achieved for each batch size.

caption: Table 1: Previous works showed that large batch sizes achieve high performing models [DBHSB22]. Using our heuristic analysis it is possible to achieve similar performance for smaller batch sizes.
description: This table compares the performance of models trained with different batch sizes.  It shows that using a heuristic privacy analysis, similar accuracy can be achieved with smaller batch sizes compared to what was previously reported in the literature using larger batch sizes. The table lists the heuristic epsilon (ε), standard epsilon, accuracy, and empirical epsilon for batch sizes of 4096, 512, and 256.
